articles.title: 'A mother's love knows no bounds': Indonesian mum tells son to lie after he stabs her - AsiaOne
articles.description: A mother's love knows no bounds, an Indonesian teen recently realised. On Sept 19, a 17-year-old boy from Central Java stabbed his mother in the stomach, killing her as a result. The pair got into a heated argument after she reprimanded her son, a school drop…
articles.content:

On Sept 19, a 17-year-old boy from Central Java stabbed his mother in the stomach, killing her as a result.

articles.title: 50-year-old is youngest Singaporean Covid-19 fatality; 1457 new cases - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A total of 1,457 new Covid-19 cases were reported in Singapore on Wednesday (Sept 22), said the Ministry of Health (MOH) in its nightly update.

articles.title: Uncharted waters for South-east Asian nations after Aukus - The Straits Times
articles.description: There is greater uncertainty but the region could gain from having a counterbalancing force against China, say analysts.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
